Text: PGE OFO Quarterly Report JanMar OIIOFO Settlement Parties Attached please find PGEs OFO Report for the First Quarter of This is provided to you in accordance with the Operational Flow Order OFO Settlement Agreement filed in the CPUCs Gas Strategy OII and approved by the CPUC by Decision The attachments consist of the Report in Word and two Appendices in Excel The Report will also be posted on the Pipe Ranger web site at pipelinelibraryindexhtmlsettlements This is the fourth quarterly report since the implementation of the OFO Settlement With a year of operating experience completed we believe the Settlement is a success in terms of reducing the impact of OFOs on the market improving market access to operational information improving the ability of the market to foresee OFO events and significantly reducing the number of systemwide OFOs An OFO Forum meeting was held on August There have not been any significant developments that have arisen from the data or discussion in the past several Quarterly Reports We see no current need for an OFO Forum meeting in the near term Please let us know if you have issues you feel would be best addressed by holding a meeting of the OFO Forum If you have any questions on this report please contact Rich Hall at or email address mailto Frank Lindh Attorney Pacific Gas and Electric Company Attachments OFO Report st QTR doc st QTR Appdx A Finalxls Appdx B st Qtr Finalxls And a Word version of the report OFO Report st QTR wdoc OFO Report st QTR doc st QTR Appdx A Finalxls Appdx B st Qtr Finalxls OFO Report st QTR wdoc
